ValidationRule.description: AD-293 to confirm the field 'Contract Start Date' is correctly populated before updating an Opportunity to 'Closed Won'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c = FALSE, RecordType.DeveloperName != "Target", ISNULL( Contract_Start_Date__c ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Sub_Stage__c ,'2.1 Future Opportunity')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Sub_Stage__c ,'2.2 Needs Analysis')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Sub_Stage__c ,'2.3 Pursuing')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Sub_Stage__c ,'3.1 RFI In Progress')), ISCHANGED(Sub_Stage__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide a Contract Start Date
